ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the reason the procedure was interrupted.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPPR.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: his information could be submitted in a SUPPPR dataset as the value of SUPPPR.QVAL where SUPPPR.QNAM = "PRITRPRS" and SUPPPR.QLABEL ="Reason Intervention Interrupted". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This CDASH field is use to collected the reason why an intervention was interrupted. The sponsor may define their own controlled terminology.
